commit.message:
Hive: Report the correct error message from HiveMetaStoreClientCompatibility1xx

PXF is not reporting the causing error message when accessing Hive
version 1.x. PXF is also not reporting the causing error message during
initialization of HiveClient. For example, when a RuntimeException is
thrown when the HiveMetaStoreClientCompatibility1xx failed to
instantiate with a MetaException cause. The reported error is
java.lang.RuntimeException: Unable to instantiate
org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.HiveMetaStoreClientCompatibility1xx,
however the error above does not report the original cause of the
exception, making debugging harder for users/administrators.

Revert "recursively modify singlecluster"

This reverts commit 3f97b1e466745412192cd2e7c12dfd9c9a2bd51e.
fix hdp3 table name expected error
Don't run the test on the security group

nodes.bodyText: we do not know for sure that RuntimeException here would be caused only by the failure to instantiate HiveMetaStoreClientCompatibility1xx , it can happen for other reasons as well, I think we should adjust the error message and log it only if we're changing the actual exception that gets propagated.
this is probably debug-level log entry as it will happen on every call for incompatible Hive versions
